definition.name: O_slice_filtration
definition.definition: The O-slice filtration on Sp^G is: tau_O^{>=n}(Sp^G) = {X in Sp^G : [Sigma, X]^G = 0 for all O-slice cells Sigma of dim < n}. This localizing subcategory admits a right adjoint P_O^n (O-slice n-connective cover). The O-slice tower is ...-> P_O^{n+1}(X) -> P_O^n(X) -> ... -> X.
